attributes.action: The will of the people voting for the UK to leave the EU must be upheld.
attributes.additional_details: It is clear  that the house of Commons and the house of lords will do anything to thwart the vote of the majority.
attributes.background: 17410742 (51.9%) of the British people voted in the EU referendum to leave. The will of the majority of the people who voted  in the EU referendum is not being upheld. Article 50 must be triggered now with no more discussion or votes
